challenges.title: Microsoft Azure
description: Make sure you can log into https://studio.azureml.net and have downloaded the materials' repository
Upload a copy of the azureml-intro.ipynb notebook that is in the materials/analyticsdojo/classes/01-overview.

You will see by executing the notebook that you can see a number of embeded datasets as part of your Microsoft Azure workspace. Try to pull one up by adopting the code to assign a dataset to a dataframe and then print out that dataframe.
